Trump is dangerous. Stop him!

enhanced_posts.text: In Ancient #China, there were many Chinese emperors who did what #Trump is doing, basically unilaterally ruling by decree/EO regardless of the law of the land and ignoring the advice of his advisors. Suffice to say after inflicting massive suffering on his people, it didn't end well for the emperor.
